answer_options: PaaS provides full operating system control to the customer
PaaS allows users to deploy their own applications onto a managed platform
PaaS includes pre-built email and office applications
PaaS hosts finished products for end users with no customization
correct_answer: PaaS allows users to deploy their own applications onto a managed platform
explanation: Unlike SaaS, which provides ready-to-use apps, PaaS enables developers to create and deploy apps in a managed environment.
